author: wsjcom
title: Voices: Working With Clients Who Are Lawyers—Michael Delgass
text:
Michael Delgass is managing director of Sontag Advisory in New York. Voices is an occasional feature of edited excerpts in which wealth managers address issues of interest to the advisory community.
Attorneys present some unique challenges for financial advisers.
In general, because they don’t always have the time necessary to devote... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
